U

update() - Method in class main.Game
Updates the current level If the player is dead, reloads the current level
update() - Method in class main.Level
Handles and updates all Elements, Projectiles, and Bombs Handles collisions of Elements Removes any elements that have been destroyed
update() - Method in class main.MyPanel
Updates the game Moves the player Calls for the player to shoot Calls repaint()
update() - Method in class tanks.enemies.EnemyTank
Update the EnemyTank
update() - Method in class tanks.enemies.moving.BombLayingTank
Updates the BombLayingTank If enough time has elapsed since the last bomb was laid, there is a random chance to lay another

Updates the GrayTank, Aims near the Player

Update the GreenTank, Aim near the player
update() - Method in class tanks.enemies.moving.MovingTank
Updates the MovingTank Adds the Tracks Generates a path and follows it Shoots if enough time has elapsed since the last shot and it will hit the Player

update() - Method in class tanks.enemies.stationary.StationaryTank
Updates the StationaryTank Randomly changes the direction the aim of the StationaryTank is changing in Shoots if it would hit the Player
